Class ViaBusCompanyModelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViaBusCompanyModelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ViaBusCompanyModelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing the main model class, which allows to save the data in the model to a file and allows the data in the model be used and processed by the controller
    Version:
    0.3, 12/12/2016
    Author:
    Krystof Spiller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • searchCustomers

        public CustomerList searchCustomers(java.lang.String searchPhrase)
        Searches for the customers based on the inputed search phrase. Calls all the methods of the CustomerList for specific customer parameters. Returned lists are merged together and returned as one CustomerList object.
        Parameters:
        searchPhrase - the search phrase as a String
        Returns:
        the CustomerList object containing all the customers who were found based on the search phrase from the argument

      • findCustomer

        public Customer findCustomer(java.lang.String fullName,
                             java.lang.String address,
                             java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                             java.lang.String emailAddress,
                             java.lang.String CVR,
                             java.lang.String companyName,
                             java.lang.String birthday)
        Searches for one specific customer based on the given arguments. Uses same methods as searchCustomers, but rather than merging them (uniting the lists), it does an intersection of the lists returned for each entered argument. If there is more than one customer in the intersection, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        fullName - the full name of a customer
        address - the address of a customer
        phoneNumber - the phone number of a customer
        emailAddress - the email address of a customer
        CVR - the CVR number of a company
        companyName - the company name
        birthday - the birthday of a customer as a String in format day/month/year (instead of slash, dot, space, hyphen and underscore can also be used)
        Returns:
        the Customer object based on the inputed arguments

      • addCustomer

        public void addCustomer(Customer customer)
        Adds a customer to the CustomerList. Uses homonymous method from Customer class.
        Parameters:

      • searchReservations

        public ReservationList searchReservations(java.lang.String searchPhrase)
        Searches for the reservations based on the inputed search phrase. Calls two-argument homonymous method with default second argument set to true, therefore searching for a tour, and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        searchPhrase - the search phrase as a String
        Returns:
        the ReservationList object containing all the reservations which were found based on the search phrase from the argument

      • addReservation

        Parameters:

      • searchTours

        public TourList searchTours(java.lang.String searchPhrase)
        Searches for the tours based on the inputed search phrase. Calls two-argument homonymous method with default second argument set to true, therefore searching for a reservation, and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        searchPhrase - the search phrase as a String
        Returns:
        the TourList object containing all the tour which were found based on the search phrase from the argument

      • getBuses

        public BusList getBuses()
        Returns:
        the BusList object containing all the buses stored in the model

      • searchBuses

        public BusList searchBuses(java.lang.String searchPhrase)
        Searches for the buses based on the inputed search phrase. Calls all the methods of the BusList for specific bus parameters. Returned lists are merged together and returned as one BusList object.
        Parameters:
        searchPhrase - the search phrase as a String
        Returns:
        the BusList object containing all the buses which were found based on the search phrase from the argument

      • getAvailableBuses

        public BusList getAvailableBuses(DateTime from,
                                 DateTime to)
        Returns available buses based on the two arguments in a BusList object.
        Parameters:
        from - the the date and time from which it searches for available buses as a DateTime object
        to - the the date and time to which it searches for available buses as a DateTime object
        Returns:
        return BusList object containing all the buses which are available from the date and time specified as the first argument until the date and time specified as the second argument

      • searchChauffeurs

        public ChauffeurList searchChauffeurs(java.lang.String searchPhrase)
        Searches for the chauffeurs based on the inputed search phrase. Calls all the methods of the ChauffeurList for specific chauffeur parameters. Returned lists are merged together and returned as one ChauffeurList object.
        Parameters:
        searchPhrase - the search phrase as a String
        Returns:
        the ChauffeurList object containing all the chauffeurs who were found based on the search phrase from the argument

      • getAvailableChauffeurs

        public ChauffeurList getAvailableChauffeurs(DateTime from,
                                            DateTime to)
        Returns available chauffeurs based on the two arguments in a ChauffeurList object.
        Parameters:
        from - the the date and time from which it searches for available buses as a DateTime object
        to - the the date and time to which it searches for available buses as a DateTime object
        Returns:
        return ChauffeurList object containing all the chauffeurs which are available from the date and time specified as the first argument until the date and time specified as the second argument
